name: Extreme Robot Transform -Fight
description:
Extreme Robot Transform -Fighting City!!!
Being the real hero transform into furious racing car, drift through survival city, chase the running robot enemies, perform crazy car bike and flying copter stunts and battle out the enemies with super fire power. Enjoy thrilling action packed battle in futuristic era where everything is taken over by powerful steel robots
Features
• Amazing Big City Environment to Explore
• Transformation of Steel Robot into Bikes and Cars
• High Quality 3d Graphics and Engaging Sound Effects
• Combination of driving transporter trucks and flying planes
